thread.section_title: Players Choice Videogames Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Players Choice Videogames | www.playerschoicevideogames.com
thread.title: Philip Lapierre
thread.title_full: Players Choice Videogames reviewed by Philip Lapierre

author: Philip Lapierre
title: Philip Lapierre
text: I ordered and Xbox 360 game on the 7 of January 2017, it is now the 17 of January 2017 and still no game. I filed two complaints and the company responded by saying that the order has been sent. I want to continue to do business with them but I'm having my doubts now, since they can't even handle sending in one Xbox 360 game.
